title: Plat Support LF ADC Duo
body: Hi guys, I'm a plat 2 support main lf an adc main to climb the ladder with. Hit me up in game, CCG Eggzille

replies.body: sup, currently a G5 adc main, probly not what you're looking for to climb with considering you're P2, but if you don't mind and you're wanting to, we could duo sometime and you could teach me how to be a better player.. (Doesn't bother me if you don't but i would appreciate it) IGN - wako487
